profile:
***CALL TO HEAR OUR SPECIAL OFFERS TODAY***

DC SHUTTERS specializes in quality Canadian Manufacturer Shutters that withstand our harsh Canadian climate. 

Customers are happy because we provide custom shutters at great prices tailored to their needs. Our consultants and have over 22 years experience EACH so they are able to help you choose wisely. 

Our installers have over 25 years installing shutters so your shutters will function perfectly for many years. Your shutter is fabricated using quality wood, vinyl and paints so it will continue to look great for many years. Everyone we show them to agrees that the quality is easy to see and feel - so see for yourself. 

You provide the coffee and we will provide FREE advice in the comfort of your home. We’ll even bring our Plantation and California Wood Shutters samples for you to review.
 
Once you review what customers say about our offering - 
 
Check Out Our Website To:
 
- BOOK APPOINTMENT
- GET A QUICK QUOTE 
- REVIEW OUR OUR OFFERING
- CHECK OUT SPECIAL OFFERS
products:
Our most popular wood shutter is manufactured by a local company 
that uses the highest high quality wood and paints, so your shutters
look better and last longer at a fraction of the price.

More important - we are able to custom design and install your 
shutters quickly. No long wait period.

Have a look at our samples and see the quality difference.

Our most popular vinyl shutter is made by Canada's 
premier manufacturers of windows - your vinyl is made of
the same pure un-recycled vinyl resin that will not change 
colour or warp.

CHECK OUT OUR WEBSITE FOR MORE PRODUCT DETAILS.

profile:
WELDA Windows and Doors where Quality Doesn`t Cost - It Pays! ----WELDA Windows and Doors - Ontario’s Home Improvement Company installs Energy Star vinyl windows, residential entry doors and patio / porch / entrance enclosures to fit any home in Toronto, GTA, Ontario. If you`re planing to upgrade your windows, doors or porch enclosure and price, quality, and service are important - you need to contact WELDA Windows and Doors.--- www. weldawindows.com --- www.ontariowindowsanddoors.ca--- We also supply and install window coverings and retractable awnings. 

Please visit www.weldashading.com---

***

Whether your preference is for basic sliding windows and steel entry doors or your taste is more for casement windows and fiberglass doors,  WELDA Windows & Doors home improvement company has the solution for you.  Replacement vinyl windows in Toronto; front entrance doors in Toronto, GTA, Barrie; energy star windows in Toronto, Brampton; porch enclosures in Oakville, Oshawa;  sliding patio doors in Kitchener, Burlington, Ajax.


***

WELDA Windows and Doors offers a full line of vinyl replacement windows, residential entry doors, porch enclosures and window coverings to enhance the architectural style of any home in the Greater Toronto Area.

***

Investing in new windows and doors should be a one-time investment, so we make every effort to provide our customers with the education and understanding they need to make an informed buying decision.

***

At WELDA Windows, our approach is different. First of all, rather than "sell" you anything, we help you "buy" windows and doors by listening to your needs and then matching those needs with the right product and installation to meet those needs. Homeowners who make "informed buying decisions" based upon having all their needs met and understanding what they are purchasing are the most satisfied customers.

***

Our consultants are very skilled at walking you through the buying process, listening to your needs and concerns, explaining the features and benefits of each product and installation and arriving at the best choice to fill your needs. They can even explain the many financing options that are available to help you get the products you want, when you want them. After choices are made, our consultants can explain the installation process. Our custom installation methods and techniques assure a neat, clean, efficient installation in your home. WELDA stands behind its work like no other home improvement company. 

***

Our products & services include:
*Energy Efficient Windows & Doors, CSA Rated, Energy Star
*Single & Double Slider Window
*Awning Window
*Single & Double Hung Window
*Casement Window
*Picture Window
*Bay Windows
*Bow Windows
*Steel Entrance Door
*Fiberglass Entry Door
*Garden Hinged Door
*Exterior Sliding Patio Door
*Windows & Doors Installation
*Porch Enclosures
*Window Coverings
*Custom Interior Shutters

***

See full details of all our products on our website: www.weldawindows.com and www.ontariowindowsanddoors.ca

profile: Amazing Window Fashions is a one stop shop for all Interior Designers, decorators, Developers, real-estate professionals and consumers. We feature an extensive selection of high quality window covering options to fit varying styles and budgets. We are pleased to offer an outstanding showroom of over 9000 square feet that is outfitted with full size displays, allowing clients to visually comprehend what the window covering looks and feels like. Given the enormous variety and quality of products we carry, the Showroom lends itself to be used by Interior Designers and decorators as a Design Resource Center. Our ongoing partnership between Amazing Window Fashions and the Interior Design community ensures that designers and decorators have easy access to the best window covering selections at preferred pricing. Our affiliation with Workroom By Design gives us the power to produce high quality products in no time, whether you have one window or 800 windows our workroom is equipped to deal with both trade and public needs. Our professional team of experts will assist you with everything you need to complete your project in a timely manner, from check measure to the final installation we do it all, we are very passionate with everything we do. Our goal is to earn your trust and build a long term relationship with your company. You can learn more about us by visiting our website www.amazingwindowfashions.com Hunter Douglas

profile:
As the nation’s #1 window coverings franchise, we give you access to more brands and more fashion-forward styles with window treatment options to fit any budget. Our Style Consultants are dedicated to giving you design help to create a home that reflects your personality, and shows off just how stylish you are.

***

Our extensive selection of window treatments includes Automated Shades, Motorized Blinds, shutters, blinds, roller shades, honeycomb shades, draperies, curtains and even window film. Regardless of the window’s size or shape, you can be rest assured that Budget Blinds Serving Ajax, Pickering & Claremont will have a customized window coverings solution ready for you. 

***

We’ll bring samples and swatches of all types of blinds, fabric and roman shades, plantation/wood shutters, curtains and custom draperies to you, so you can see how they look in your home before you buy. Our in-home consultation beats running from store to store or taking your chances online. We’ll measure your windows, do the ordering, inspect your window coverings on delivery, install them perfectly and empower you with our "No Questions Asked Warranty"†!  It’s never been easier to get exactly what you want. Let’s get started planning your new custom window coverings project today!
